12_sided_die.name: 12-sided Die
12_sided_die.description: This die has 12 sides. One for every Giant, plus a mystery guest.

ayn_rand_doll.name: Ayn Rand Doll
ayn_rand_doll.description: Contradictions do not exist: but this doll does. Every time you cuddle your doll, you feel like it was the doll's idea, and you had no choice but to submit. Weird.

camera.name: Camera
camera.description: A useful handheld gizmo with a lens, a button, and lots of complex intricate technical gubbins on the inside. Depending on who you ask, cameras are either for taking pretty pictures, or for stealing the soul of whoever they point at. This one is mainly for pictures though. You'd need a much bigger memory card for souls.

cubimal_series_1_box.name: Cubimal Series 1 Box
cubimal_series_1_box.description: Contains one (1) Series 1 Cubimal. Open it up to find out which one is inside. Collect them all!

cubimal_series_2_box.name: Cubimal Series 2 Box
cubimal_series_2_box.description: Contains one (1) Series 2 Cubimal. Open it up to find out which one is inside. Collect 'em all!

emotional_bear.name: Emotional Bear
emotional_bear.description: When you can't express how you're feeling, this furry companion will emote on your behalf. Particularly when equipped with Lips for kissing or a Moon for you-know-whatting…

fortune.name: Fortune
fortune.description: For those who believe their fate is predetermined, this fortune holds your destiny. Plus, your lucky lottery numbers!

fortune_cookie.name: Fortune Cookie
fortune_cookie.description: Comes without a note inside. Add your own and give it to a friend!

friedrich_nietzsche_doll.name: Friedrich Nietzsche Doll
friedrich_nietzsche_doll.description: He sure is talky, but this moustachioed little chap isn't very comforting to cuddle. But then how cuddly, exactly, were you expecting your My Little Nietzsche to be?

garden_gnome.name: Garden Gnome
garden_gnome.description: Hey, it's that weird old tiny bearded life-companion you've been hoping for! When placed in your yard, house or on your home street, your new little chum will reveal his hidden (or "creepy") talents…

gift_box_wrapped.name: Gift Box
gift_box_wrapped.description: One mystery surprise gift box, filled with… well, filled with gifts. But what gifts? There's only one way to find out… No, not asking the person who gave it to you. The OTHER, non-spoilerific way. Open it!

glitchmas_card.name: Glitchmas Card
glitchmas_card.description: A holiday greeting card, containing a heart-warming poem.

glitchmas_cracker.name: Glitchmas Cracker
glitchmas_cracker.description: Ostensibly a seasonal cardboard tube wrapped in colored paper. But so much more than that too. Once opened, it looks like it may contain a surprise, a gift, and curious lack of party hat. You probably need somebody else to help you pull it open to find out, though.

glitchmas_cracker_factoid.name: Glitchmas Cracker Fun Fact
glitchmas_cracker_factoid.description: A piece of fun and useful trivia. This would be a good conversation starter at holiday parties. Or not.

glitchmas_cracker_joke.name: Glitchmas Cracker Joke
glitchmas_cracker_joke.description: A joke of dubious quality found in a Glitchmas Cracker. Who writes these things, anyway?

lips.name: Lips
lips.description: Pre-pursed, super-soft and infused with an antibacterial salve, these lips can be attached to whatever might help you kiss people better. Like, say, an Emotional Bear.

ludwig_wittgenstein_doll.name: Ludwig Wittgenstein Doll
ludwig_wittgenstein_doll.description: A depressed, closeted, singularly-focused Anglicized Austrian: student, schoolteacher, professor, maniac ... genius?

moon.name: Moon
moon.description: One full, craterous moon, without which mooning cannot happen. Most useful if attached to an Emotional Bear.

party_aquarius.name: Aquarius Party Pack
party_aquarius.description: Swim, float & drift your way around this quoin-laden party space. And, remember … quoining is always more fun with friends!

party_double_rainbow.name: Double Rainbow Party Pack
party_double_rainbow.description: One ephemeral cute-as-a-button party space, perfect for private events. When activated, temporary party location includes complimentary mineables, munchables and mixables, sparkles and lollipops and glee.

party_mazzala_gala.name: Mazza'la Gala Party Pack
party_mazzala_gala.description: One private and transient five-room wooden party lodge. When activated, temporary party location includes DIY hearty party feast, beer, booze, and one very dark make-out room.

party_nylon_phool.name: Nylon Phool Party Pack
party_nylon_phool.description: One temporary underwater pool-party spot. When activated, this ephemeral party place includes a complimentary DIY juice bar, smoothie-zone and Spicy Grog spot, replenishing nibbles and unlimited floatiness.

party_pitchen_lilliputt.name: Pitchen Lilliputt Party Pack
party_pitchen_lilliputt.description: Miniature Ur for Glitchean giants in one small but perfectly formed temporary party location. When activated, this ephemeral party spot includes minables, nibbles, snacks and sammiches, and one DIY fancy-cocktail bar.

party_taster_aquarius.name: Aquarius Party Pack Taster
party_taster_aquarius.description: Swim, float & drift your way around this quoin-laden party space. And, remember … quoining is always more fun with friends!

party_taster_double_rainbow.name: Double Rainbow Party Pack Taster
party_taster_double_rainbow.description: One ephemeral cute-as-a-button party space, perfect for private events. When activated, temporary party location includes complimentary mineables, munchables and mixables, sparkles and lollipops and glee.

party_taster_mazzala_gala.name: Mazza'la Gala Party Pack Taster
party_taster_mazzala_gala.description: One private and transient five-room wooden party lodge. When activated, temporary party location includes DIY hearty party feast, beer, booze, and one very dark make-out room.

party_taster_nylon_phool.name: Nylon Phool Party Pack Taster
party_taster_nylon_phool.description: One temporary underwater pool-party spot. When activated, this ephemeral party place includes a complimentary DIY juice bar, smoothie-zone and Spicy Grog spot, replenishing nibbles and unlimited floatiness.

party_taster_pitchen_lilliputt.name: Pitchen Lilliputt Party Pack Taster
party_taster_pitchen_lilliputt.description: Miniature Ur for Glitchean giants in one small but perfectly formed temporary party location. When activated, this ephemeral party spot includes minables, nibbles, snacks and sammiches, and one DIY fancy-cocktail bar.

party_taster_toxic_moon.name: Toxic Moon Party Pack Taster
party_taster_toxic_moon.description: One secluded and totally transient lunar location. When activated, temporary party spot includes ingredients for cocktails, sparkly rocks for space-mining, and a notable lack of gravity, for super-awesome-space-jumpiness.

party_taster_val_holla.name: Val Holla Party Pack Taster
party_taster_val_holla.description: Soar to new heights in this quoin-heavy party space. Grab a bunch of your closest friends, and get ready to Party Shardy!

party_taster_winter_wingding.name: Winter Wingding Party Pack Taster
party_taster_winter_wingding.description: One temporary wonderland, perfect for holiday get-togethers and winterly fun. When activated, this icy private party spot includes trees for decorating, ingredients for heart-warming drinkables and a DIY pie bar.

party_toxic_moon.name: Toxic Moon Party Pack
party_toxic_moon.description: One secluded and totally transient lunar location. When activated, temporary party spot includes ingredients for cocktails, sparkly rocks for space-mining, and a notable lack of gravity, for super-awesome-space-jumpiness.

party_val_holla.name: Val Holla Party Pack
party_val_holla.description: Soar to new heights in this quoin-heavy party space. Grab a bunch of your closest friends, and get ready to Party Shardy!

party_winter_wingding.name: Winter Wingding Party Pack
party_winter_wingding.description: One temporary wonderland, perfect for holiday get-togethers and winterly fun. When activated, this icy private party spot includes trees for decorating, ingredients for heart-warming drinkables and a DIY pie bar.

play_cube.name: Play Cube
play_cube.description: Play Cubes are famous the world over. Re-live some of your favorite quest memories with one simple click. Don't waste another minute, play with your cube now!

random_kindness.name: Random Kindness
random_kindness.description: This priceless item dispenses random kindness.

ticket_amazing_race.name: Amazing Race Ticket
ticket_amazing_race.description: Challenge another player to the Amazing Race.

ticket_canyon_run.name: Canyon Run Ticket
ticket_canyon_run.description: Challenge another player to Canyon Run.

ticket_crystal_climb.name: Crystal Climb Ticket
ticket_crystal_climb.description: Challenge another player to Crystal Climb.

ticket_game_of_crowns.name: Game of Crowns Ticket
ticket_game_of_crowns.description: Challenge another player to Game of Crowns.

ticket_gameshow.name: Gameshow Ticket
ticket_gameshow.description: One glittery, razzling, dazzling game show ticket. Ain't nothing you can do but USE it.

ticket_grab_em_good.name: Grab 'Em Good Ticket
ticket_grab_em_good.description: Challenge another player to Grab 'Em Good.

ticket_lava_leap.name: Lava Leap Ticket
ticket_lava_leap.description: Challenge another player to Lava Leap.

ticket_space_race.name: Space Race Ticket
ticket_space_race.description: Challenge another player to Space Race.

ticket_star_sprint.name: Star Sprint Ticket
ticket_star_sprint.description: Challenge another player to Star Sprint.

ticket_the_great_hog_haul.name: The Great Hog Haul Ticket
ticket_the_great_hog_haul.description: Challenge another player to The Great Hog Haul.

ticket_time_warp.name: Time Warp Ticket
ticket_time_warp.description: Challenge another player to Time Warp.

wrappable_gift_box.name: Wrappable Gift Box
wrappable_gift_box.description: An empty box, filled with promise. Not really, it's filled with nothing, but once someone (the gifter) fills it with something (the gift), wraps it, and gives it to another (the giftee) it will be filled with joy. Each box can take three stacks of joy (or three stacks of anything, in fact).
